#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,*a,*sum,sum1,i,found;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		found=0;
		sum1=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		a=new int[n];
		sum=new int[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			sum1+=a[i];
			sum[i]=sum1;
		}
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(sum[i-1]==(sum1-sum[i]))
			{
				found=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(found)
		printf("%d\n",a[i]);
		else
		printf("NO EQUILIBRIUM\n");
	}
}
